title: Nexonia and Radius to Host Live Webinar on Global Payroll
text:
The Live Event Will Provide Insight into Optimizing International Payroll Operations
Toronto, Ontario (PRWEB) September 17, 2015
Nexonia Inc., leading provider of web and mobile business financial management solutions, together with partners Radius, experts in planning, executing and managing international operations worldwide, today announced that they will present a live webinar titled, “Global Payroll & Expenses: Why your Process is Outdated”, on Tuesday, September 22, at 1:00 PM Eastern Time. The webinar will offer expert advice from Neil Wainwright, CEO of Nexonia Inc, and David Reichert, Director, Product Management at Radius.
“International payroll management can be tricky for even the most organized global companies,” said Neil Wainwright. “Anyone attending this webinar will have a better understanding of the tools they’ll need to successfully tackle complicated compliance issues, multinational taxes and streamlined reporting.”
Co-presented by Nexonia and Radius, the webinar will provide information on:
Compliance considerations for global payroll operations
Common issues and trends in multinational payroll
Reporting and withholding obligations and how they differ from country to country
How to automate expense reporting, timesheets or vacation tracking
Flexible workflows for managing expenses, timesheets and paid time off (PTO)
Delivery of payment options
For more information and to register for the Tuesday, September 22 (1PM EDT) webinar, visit the Radius Worldwide Knowledge Site .
About Radius
Radius helps companies expand and win globally. Clients from startups to larger multinationals take advantage of Radius’ international accounting, finance, banking, tax, HR, legal and compliance support to simplify their core operations, reduce their risk exposure and improve the management and control of their overseas businesses.
Radius delivers support and expertise through managed services, advisory services and OverseasConnect, our integrated cloud-based software platform, to create solutions that meet the needs of over 600 clients operating in 110 countries around the world. Headquartered in Bristol, UK with offices in the US, Brazil, China, Germany, India, Japan and Singapore, we are the global growth experts. For more information, please visit http://www.radiusworldwide.com .
